column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Went here for my first testing of Chicago's Deep dish pizza
column3: but the service was the worst!!!!! We sat outside
column5: and couldn't seem to handle basic server responsibilities like checking to see how our food was
column6: do we need a box for our leftovers
column7: would we like dessert or how about our check? I might mention that it was 8:00 on Labor Day Monday
column8: it was muggy with humidity so I am assuming he wanted to hang out more in the air conditioning
column9: then service the diners outside. I couldn't help but wonder how many people leave without paying for their meal
